title: Are old chargers ok to use?
content:
I see the Google Store has chargers (18W and 45W) for purchasing extra chargers. I always wonder if I have ruined batteries on old phones by using random chargers/charging bricks.  

Is it safe to use old chargers from other phones that are USB C still?  Is there a such thing as a "USB C" cable that shouldn't be used, or are all cables safe?  I know some can be .5A input / 3A output bricks, some are 1A input/3A output, etc.  What old chargers are safe to use without buying a new $65 dollar one from the Google Store?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3a XL
